verses.verse: לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> sake צִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> For Zion's לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶחֱשֶׁ֔ה <WH2814> sake will I not hold my peace וּלְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> sake יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> and for Jerusalem's לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶשְׁק֑וֹט <WH8252> sake I will not rest עַד־ <WH5704> Until יֵצֵ֤א <WH3318> thereof go forth כַנֹּ֙גַהּ֙ <WH5051> as brightness צִדְקָ֔הּ <WH6664> until the righteousness וִישׁוּעָתָ֖הּ <WH3444> and the salvation כְּלַפִּ֥יד <WH3940> thereof as a lamp יִבְעָֽר׃ <WH1197> [that] burneth

וְרָא֤וּ <WH7200> shall see גוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> And the Gentiles צִדְקֵ֔ךְ <WH6664> thy righteousness וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> and all kings כְּבוֹדֵ֑ךְ <WH3519> thy glory וְקֹ֤רָא <WH7121> and thou shalt be called לָךְ֙ שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shall name חָדָ֔שׁ <WH2319> by a new אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> Which פִּ֥י <WH6310> which the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יִקֳּבֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5344> name

וְהָיִ֛יתְ <WH1961> will also be a עֲטֶ֥רֶת <WH5850> Thou shalt also be a crown תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <WH8597> of glory בְּיַד־ <WH3027> in the hand יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD [וּצְנֹוף כ] (וּצְנִ֥יף <WH6797> diadem ק) מְלוּכָ֖ה <WH4410> and a royal בְּכַף־ <WH3709> in the hand אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <WH430> of thy God

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no יֵאָמֵר֩ <WH559> Thou shalt no more be termed לָ֨ךְ ע֜וֹד <WH5750> longer עֲזוּבָ֗ה <WH5805> forsaking וּלְאַרְצֵךְ֙ <WH776> neither shall thy land לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יֵאָמֵ֥ר <WH559> any more be termed עוֹד֙ <WH5750> any שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> Desolate כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לָ֗ךְ יִקָּרֵא֙ <WH7121> but thou shalt be called חֶפְצִי־ בָ֔הּ <WH2657> Hephzibah וּלְאַרְצֵ֖ךְ <WH776> and thy land בְּעוּלָ֑ה <WH1166> Beulah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָפֵ֤ץ <WH2654> delighteth יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD בָּ֔ךְ וְאַרְצֵ֖ךְ <WH776> in thee and thy land תִּבָּעֵֽל׃ <WH1166> shall be married

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יִבְעַ֤ל <WH1166> marrieth בָּחוּר֙ <WH970> For [as] a young man בְּתוּלָ֔ה <WH1330> a virgin יִבְעָל֖וּךְ <WH1166> marry בָּנָ֑יִךְ <WH1121> [so] shall thy sons וּמְשׂ֤וֹשׂ <WH4885> rejoiceth חָתָן֙ <WH2860> thee and [as] the bridegroom עַל־ <WH5921> over כַּלָּ֔ה <WH3618> over the bride יָשִׂ֥ישׂ <WH7797> rejoice עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> over אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <WH430> [so] shall thy God

עַל־ <WH5921> on חוֹמֹתַ֣יִךְ <WH2346> upon thy walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> O Jerusalem הִפְקַ֙דְתִּי֙ <WH6485> I have set שֹֽׁמְרִ֔ים <WH8104> watchmen כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַלַּ֛יְלָה <WH3915> nor night תָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> [which] shall never לֹ֣א <WH3808> will never יֶחֱשׁ֑וּ <WH2814> hold their peace הַמַּזְכִּרִים֙ <WH2142> ye that make mention אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אַל־ <WH408> no דֳּמִ֖י <WH1824> keep not silence לָכֶֽם׃

וְאַֽל־ <WH408> no תִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> And give דֳמִ֖י <WH1824> him no rest ל֑וֹ עַד־ <WH5704> until יְכוֹנֵ֞ן <WH3559> till he establish וְעַד־ <WH5704> until יָשִׂ֧ים <WH7760> and till he make אֶת־ <WH853> יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> Jerusalem תְּהִלָּ֖ה <WH8416> a praise בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the earth

נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <WH7650> hath sworn יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD בִּֽימִינ֖וֹ <WH3225> by his right hand וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> and by the arm עֻזּ֑וֹ <WH5797> of his strength אִם־ <WH518> Surely I will אֶתֵּן֩ <WH5414> no more give אֶת־ <WH853> דְּגָנֵ֨ךְ <WH1715> thy corn ע֤וֹד <WH5750> again מַֽאֲכָל֙ <WH3978> [to be] meat לְאֹ֣יְבַ֔יִךְ <WH341> for thine enemies וְאִם־ <WH518> Nor יִשְׁתּ֤וּ <WH8354> shall not drink בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the sons נֵכָר֙ <WH5236> of the stranger תִּֽירוֹשֵׁ֔ךְ <WH8492> thy wine אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יָגַ֖עַתְּ <WH3021> for the which thou hast laboured בּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for מְאַסְפָיו֙ <WH622> But they that have gathered יֹאכְלֻ֔הוּ <WH398> it shall eat וְהִֽלְל֖וּ <WH1984> it and praise אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וּֽמְקַבְּצָ֥יו <WH6908> and they that have brought it together יִשְׁתֻּ֖הוּ <WH8354> shall drink בְּחַצְר֥וֹת <WH2691> it in the courts קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <WH6944> of my holiness ס

עִבְר֤וּ <WH5674> Go through עִבְרוּ֙ <WH5674> go through בַּשְּׁעָרִ֔ים <WH8179> the gates פַּנּ֖וּ <WH6437> prepare דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> ye the way הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people סֹ֣לּוּ <WH5549> cast up סֹ֤לּוּ <WH5549> cast up הַֽמְסִלָּה֙ <WH4546> the highway סַקְּל֣וּ <WH5619> gather out מֵאֶ֔בֶן <WH68> the stones הָרִ֥ימוּ <WH7311> lift up נֵ֖ס <WH5251> a standard עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> for the people

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Behold the LORD הִשְׁמִ֙יעַ֙ <WH8085> hath proclaimed אֶל־ <WH413> to קְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> unto the end הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the world אִמְרוּ֙ <WH559> Say לְבַת־ <WH1323> ye to the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Lo יִשְׁעֵ֖ךְ <WH3468> Behold thy salvation בָּ֑א <WH935> cometh הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold שְׂכָרוֹ֙ <WH7939> behold his reward אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for וּפְעֻלָּת֖וֹ <WH6468> [is] with him and his work לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וְקָרְא֥וּ <WH7121> And they shall call לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like עַם־ <WH5971> people הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> them The holy גְּאוּלֵ֣י <WH1350> The redeemed יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְלָךְ֙ יִקָּרֵ֣א <WH7121> and thou shalt be called דְרוּשָׁ֔ה <WH1875> Sought out עִ֖יר <WH5892> A city לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נֶעֱזָֽבָה׃ <WH5800> not forsaken ס
